subject: Horse Racing
Horses
Street Sense (Race Horse)
Belmont Stakes
lead_paragraph: After a disappointing summer, Curlin sprung back to life with a narrow win over the favorite, Lawyer Ron, in Sunday’s Jockey Club Gold Cup at Belmont.
snippet: After a disappointing summer, Curlin sprung back to life with a narrow win over the favorite, Lawyer Ron, in Sunday’s Jockey Club Gold Cup at Belmont.
